items.Text:
Beyond Rule 4 - Your Age of Money is ever rising. You're feeling in control of your money. Congratulations! 
What would you like to accomplish next?
items.Name: Beyond Rule 4
items.Description:
Your Age of Money is ever rising. You're feeling in control of your money. Congratulations! 
What would you like to accomplish next?

items.Text:
Budget Feeder - Sync your Australian bank transactions to YNAB! 

148 Australian Banks and credit cards supported including Amex, ANZ, Westpac, NAB and CBA.

No need to enter transactions manually, with automatic bank feeds your transactions sync seamlessly to your YNAB budget accounts every day. Let Budget Feeder do the hard work for you.
items.Name: Budget Feeder
items.Description:
Sync your Australian bank transactions to YNAB! 

148 Australian Banks and credit cards supported including Amex, ANZ, Westpac, NAB and CBA.

No need to enter transactions manually, with automatic bank feeds your transactions sync seamlessly to your YNAB budget accounts every day. Let Budget Feeder do the hard work for you.

items.Text: Calendar for YNAB - Subscribe to a calendar of your transactions.
items.Name: Calendar for YNAB
items.Description: Subscribe to a calendar of your transactions.

items.Text: Check Out My Budget: Browser Extension - Take your budget with you to places you shop online. Displaying your budget there when you are ready to make a purchase will help you stick to your budget and avoid impulse buys.  Customize the categories that are displayed from your budget on each website so you can see the relevant ones easily for the website that you are visiting.
items.Name: Check Out My Budget: Browser Extension
items.Description: Take your budget with you to places you shop online. Displaying your budget there when you are ready to make a purchase will help you stick to your budget and avoid impulse buys.  Customize the categories that are displayed from your budget on each website so you can see the relevant ones easily for the website that you are visiting.

items.Text:
Check Out My Budget: Transaction Copier for YNAB - Have you ever wanted to play around with your YNAB categories, re-categorizing some of your transactions just to see how it would work? YNAB’s Fresh Start only copies over the categories and accounts, but doesn’t bring the transactions over so it is hard to do this without risking messing up your existing budget.

This tool copies the transactions from one budget to a new budget, containing all the transactions into a single "migration" account. When you run this tool, the new budget must be a "Fresh Start" of the old one with all the same groups and categories but once the tool has run and the transactions are are copied over, you can re-categorize and experiment to your hearts content!
items.Name: Check Out My Budget: Transaction Copier for YNAB
items.Description:
Have you ever wanted to play around with your YNAB categories, re-categorizing some of your transactions just to see how it would work? YNAB’s Fresh Start only copies over the categories and accounts, but doesn’t bring the transactions over so it is hard to do this without risking messing up your existing budget.

This tool copies the transactions from one budget to a new budget, containing all the transactions into a single "migration" account. When you run this tool, the new budget must be a "Fresh Start" of the old one with all the same groups and categories but once the tool has run and the transactions are are copied over, you can re-categorize and experiment to your hearts content!

items.Text:
FinInsights for YNAB - AI-powered financial intelligence for YNAB budgets. FinInsights provides
  read-only budget analysis, spending pattern detection, and intelligent
  reallocation recommendations to help users optimize their YNAB budgets.
items.Name: FinInsights for YNAB
items.Description:
AI-powered financial intelligence for YNAB budgets. FinInsights provides
  read-only budget analysis, spending pattern detection, and intelligent
  reallocation recommendations to help users optimize their YNAB budgets.

items.Text: GPT for YNAB (Unofficial) - AI assistant for You Need A Budget (YNAB), powered by ChatGPT. Not affiliated with or endorsed by YNAB. As with any AI, this assistant can hallucinate or be flat out wrong. DO NOT make financial decisions based on this assistant.
items.Name: GPT for YNAB (Unofficial)

items.Text: Importer for YNAB - Importer for YNAB is a free, open-source tool that helps you convert Israeli bank and credit card files to the YNAB format. It supports major banks and credit cards including Isracard, Cal, Max, Mizrahi, and Poalim.
items.Name: Importer for YNAB
items.Description: Importer for YNAB is a free, open-source tool that helps you convert Israeli bank and credit card files to the YNAB format. It supports major banks and credit cards including Isracard, Cal, Max, Mizrahi, and Poalim.

items.Name: LedgerGPT

items.Text: Lumy - Lumy helps you get more out of your YNAB budget with features like Month in Review, Frugal Month, Spend Trackers, and more! Tune into your budget with configurable reports and charts, and join the active community of Lumy users on our Discord!

items.Text: On Target Analysis For YNAB - Allows you to compare how closely the money they assigned matches your targets/goals for the month. Quickly highlights categories you assigned much more than you targeted and much less than you targeted. This quick comparison makes it easy to reflect on if you made the right trade offs

items.Text: Receipts for YNAB - Receipts for YNAB helps you turn paper receipts into transactions in your YNAB plan. On iOS 26 and later, it uses on-device Apple Intelligence to scan receipts, extract the merchant, date, total, and line items, and then lets you review and send the transaction to the YNAB budget you choose. All receipt processing happens on your device, and Receipts for YNAB is an independent third-party app that is not sponsored or endorsed by YNAB.
items.Name: Receipts for YNAB
items.Description: Receipts for YNAB helps you turn paper receipts into transactions in your YNAB plan.
